title: Inquiry on Best Practices for Team Collaboration
description: A team manager asks for advice on the best way to configure the product for collaboration between their design and development teams.

tasks.description: Understand the customer's specific workflow and collaboration goals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent asks clarifying questions to understand the team's needs.

tasks.description: Search the internal knowledge base for best practice guides related to 'design-to-dev handoff'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a relevant guide and a case study from a similar company.

tasks.description: Summarize the key recommendations from the guide, explaining how to set up specific project boards, user roles, and integrations to facilitate their workflow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides actionable, expert advice tailored to the customer's use case.
